Subject: Penguicon Robot Build
Description: Come help design and build a robot during the convention. Donations may be accepted depending on the robot design. No skill necessary to help but prior experience would be useful. Useful skills include familiarity with microcontrollers, structural design, costume design, programming, graphic design, and logic!  Speakers include:James Hice, John D. Bell - Track: DIY, Costuming  - Duration: 4 hours and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
